title: Carrier baskets
content: The pannier baskets can be fitted on the right and left, rather like panniers. This leaves the carrier free to be used for other things. Their large storage space of approx. 22 litres was designed to carry shopping bags each weighing up to 7 kg.

warnings: Format mismatch: Missing card-info container, Missing "More Information" button
Minor format differences: Missing border-radius styling, Missing box-shadow styling
